fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may select to spy on a faction at the start of the game before the game begins as roles are rolling.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you spy on a faction, you gain access to the chat and fake (non-head) factional role.
- You may fake performing an action on a player according to your given role.
- If you die, your team loses an additional member, if you out 2/3 (or more) of the faction you spy on, you will be modkilled and lose the game.
